channel.title: Fix mopar logo taking you home!
channel.description:
[img]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/moparscape.png[/img]
Can't click it to navigate home anymore. Fix plz
For those saying it does work go suck one because I've tried on my phone, computer and laptop.
Thx :rolleyes:

item.title: Fix mopar logo taking you home!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:14, topic:540081”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=658932.msg4409217#msg4409217 date=1392990008]
This is very easy, you have to modify BoardIndex.template.php in both themes, anyone want to do it and submit a pull request:
https://github.com/moparisthebest/moparisthebest.com-smf
?

Otherwise I’ll do it when I get around to it.
[/quote]I have submitted a pull request for this. I only had to modify the default theme since it appears the curve theme already offers this.[/quote]
Merged in the changes, thanks much!

sinisoul:

I love how we are all finding bugs but then we never submit fixes now that we have the power to.

Actually so far 3 people have submitted bug fixes in the form of pull requests, Tom, AtomicInt_, and Pure. I’m happy with that. ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Fix mopar logo taking you home!

item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:540081”]This is super outdated:
http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=1370
I’m sure someone good with php or webdev in general could mod that to work.[/quote]
A simple tag should fix this lol

item.title: Fix mopar logo taking you home!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Vain_:

why a mod? why not just add an anchor in the header file where the logo is called to point to the board_index

To be honest, that’s probably what the mod does. (It’s outdated and doesn’t run on 2.0.7 anyways). I was posting more of so you had an example of where the logo code may be.

Read full topic

item.title: Fix mopar logo taking you home!
item.dc:creator: @ixia ixia
item.description:
@ixia wrote:

naseem142:

Yes it doesn’t work , but is it so hard to click the “HOME” button on the bar?

I didn’t even know there was a home button till the banner stopped working.

The buttons that I’ve never clicked on till today was Home, Help and Search. Never going to need to click on Calender ever.
